# 1928 Rutgers Queensmen football team

The 1928 Rutgers Queensmen football team represented Rutgers University as an independent during the 1928 college football season. In their second season under head coach Harry Rockafeller, the Queensmen compiled a 6â€“3 record and were outscored by their opponents, 116 to 97.
